title: Wolves + Ras Algethi
description:
Two albums by American Black Ambient group Wolves in the Throne Room:

Diadem of 12 Stars (2006)
1.Queen of Borrowed Light-12:58
2.Face in a Night Time Mirror (Part 1)-13:21
3.Face in a Night Time Mirror (Part 2)-13:58
4.(A Shimmering Radiance) Diadem of 12 Stars-20:22

Two Hunters (2007)
1.Dia Artio- 5:59
2.Behold the Vastness and Sorrow-12:12
3.Cleansing-9:55
4.I will Lay Down My Bones Among the Rocks and Roots-18:16

AND

The only album (far as I know) by the incomparable death/doom metal band Ras Algethi. It\&#039;s pretty rare; I\&#039;ve never seen a copy of it up on Ebay or the like sites. 

 Oneiricon-The White Hypnotic
1. Aldebaran Crossing(2:14)
2. The Bride Eternal(10:17)
3. When Fire is Father(8:53)
4. Keys of Urtam(8:42)
5. With An Halo of Flames(2:50)
6. Symbols (In Luce Obliqua)(12:15)
7. Nubes Obscura(5:38)
8. In White Hypnotic(6:33)
